<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mega Bomb](/Feats.aspx?ID=5805) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Additive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=795" />
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=812" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 69 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You can add a highly explosive additive to an alchemical bomb to turn it into a mega bomb. Throwing this bomb takes a 2-action activity instead of a Strike. This isn't a Strike, and you don't make an attack roll. The mega bomb explodes in a 30-foot burst within 60 feet. It deals damage as if each creature were the primary target, with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save. On a failed save, a creature also takes any extra effects that affect a primary target (such as [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) from [bottled lightning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3290)). Though all targets in the area take [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=699) damage as primary targets, there is no further splash beyond that area.
name: Mega Bomb
